entries.title: Car-sharing app offers private vehicles for hire
entries.description: BBC Click's Nick Kwek test drives a car from a firm offering an alternative to traditional rentals.

entries.title: Lockdowns linked to tenfold rise in child sex imagery
entries.description: A charity says its data highlights how predators took advantage of the worldwide Covid-19 situation.

entries.title: Hemp makes a comeback in the construction industry
entries.description: A revival of hemp cultivation in Portugal has spurred the use of hemp blocks in construction.

entries.title: Warning over risky electric blankets sold online
entries.description: The consumer rights group Which? found products being sold online that could cause electric shocks.
